name: Blue Energy Animation Pack!
description:
14 Animations!

Get beam, explosions, fire and shields in this pack!

== Effekseer / RPGM MZ ==

 Make sure you updated your effekseer plugins and libs before using the effekseer version in RPG Maker MZ!

== RPG Maker MV / VX Ace ==

A sample project is included for RPG Maker MV, for easy importation.
For VX Ace, only the graphics files are provided.

== Other Engines == 

* Animations spritesheets : 192x192 / frame, designed at 15 FPS.

== Terms Of Use ==
